content: 1st chain ~*chain 3 and slip_stitch in the 1st chain then slip_stitch to the main chain chain of 12 then slip_stitch all the way down the back bumps of the chain fasten_off leaving a tail for sewing on to the frog s body later limbs picture guide *guide continues next page body picture guide pt 3 mouth emroidery detail now we are going to assemble our frog 1 attach the limbs on each side of the frog between row 8 &9 approximately for the arms a couple row under cheek detail & attach the legs between row 18&19 approximately at each of the bottom corners of the last round to attach use the two tails on each of the limbs and a yarn needle to pull each of the tails one at a time inside the frog s body i like to slide each of the two tails on the four limbs on the right and then the second tail on the left of the same stitch then tie off on the inside to secure *note i pulled each tail on the left and right of the same stitch & then flip the body inside out to tie it off and trim the tails alternatively you can weave in tails stuff the frog starting with the eye bumps and then the body sew bottom closed using a yarn needle and the mattress stitch *see assembly picture guide on next page assembly picture guide disclaimer congrats you re done making your leggy frog thank you for your support again and i hope that you enjoyed making this pattern you are welcome to make and sell items using my pattern but please do not claim as your own invention and give me credit as the pattern creator my name/handle on instagram tiktok twitter etc is bombercrafts feel free to tag me for pattern credit purposes or to share with me your makes i would love to see your crocheted leggy frog *do not share my pattern privately link people to my kofi shop or ravelry instead so they can buy/download the patterns for themselves
